duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess the areas of the individual's life where assistance is needed.
Offer and coordinate resources for the individuals being supported.
Monitor service delivery and work with providers to ensure the individual's needs are met.
Participate in service plan development and attend regular in-person meetings with individuals served and their interdisciplinary teams.
Case note client-related work to create billable units.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Social Work or related field. Licensure in Social Work (or seeking licensure) required.
